title: Moskowitz, a Democrat, shuts down talk of his joining Trump's team
shortDescription: Moskowitz has emerged as a leading voice for bipartisanship among Democrats. But he says he has no current intentions of leaving Congress.

title: RFK Jr.'s nomination sparks skepticism for these Democrats and Republicans.
shortDescription: From his stances on vaccines to industrial farming and abortion, Robert F. Kennedy Jr. faces tough questions from senators.

title: Trump sues Des Moines Register, Gannett over Iowa election poll
shortDescription: Trump's lawsuit against the Des Moines Register and its parent company, Gannett, is one of several the president-elect filed against news companies.

title: RFK Jr. seeks Senate support amid backlash
shortDescription: Amid mounting concerns about his anti-vaccine stances, Robert F. Kennedy Jr. visited the Senate to gain support for his nomination.

title: 'Chaos': Justin Trudeau's finance minister quits, Canada braces for Trump
shortDescription: Finance Minister Chrystia Freeland quit rather than take a demotion after she opposed Trudeau's plans for more government spending.

title: First lady Jill Biden announces she is leaving her teaching post
shortDescription: Dr. Jill Biden was the first FLOTUS to keep her day job while serving in her White House role. She left Northern Virginia Community College.

title: Trump alleges jury misconduct in New York criminal hush money case
shortDescription: Donald Trump has alleged there was jury misconduct in his New York hush money criminal trial. Prosecutors called it "unsworn, unsupported, hearsay."

title: Outgoing GOP leader Mitch McConnell 'fine' after fall in DC
shortDescription: Republican senators say Sen. Mitch McConnell is fine after a fall during the GOP's weekly lunch on Tuesday.

title: Trump's Cabinet is sparking debate. His supporters think it's just right.
shortDescription: Trump voters – both the die hard and casual – in 11 states across the U.S. are supportive of the president-elect's cabinet picks.

title: Trump transition team plans rollback of Biden EV, emissions policies
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump’s transition team is recommending sweeping changes to cut off support for electric vehicles, according to a document seen by Reuters.

title: Bill designating bald eagle as national bird heads to Biden's desk
shortDescription: The bald eagle, once on the brink of extinction, has made a "remarkable" comeback in recent years, according to the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service.

title: Trump hush money felony conviction upheld despite immunity ruling
shortDescription: Judge Juan Merchan sided with Manhattan prosecutors in saying Trump's actions were "unofficial" and therefore not protected by presidential immunity

title: 'Shocking and unconscionable': Biden mourns school shooting victims
shortDescription: President Joe Biden urged Congress to pass 'commonsense' gun-safety laws following Wisconsin school shooting that killed two and wounded six others

title: Trump press conference proves again how he can dominate the news cycle
shortDescription: The president-elect seemed relaxed and even polite to reporters in his first – and marathon – press event since his Nov. 5 election victory.

title: Trump invites Ukraine's Zelenskyy to presidential inauguration
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump has been offering inauguration invitations to foreign leaders. His latest: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

title: Trump to Biden: 'Stop selling the wall'
shortDescription: Trump is calling on President Biden to "stop selling the wall," but the White House said it is following the law for unused wall pieces.

title: Biden designates Frances Perkins National Monument
shortDescription: President Joe Biden signed the proclamation honoring the nation's longest serving labor secretary and first woman cabinet member, Frances Perkins.

title: Trump says he will fire federal employees who won't return to office
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump said he'd fire federal workers who won't return to the office and also challenge in court a Biden-era deal on the issue.

title: Trump weighs in after Duke lacrosse accuser admits false rape claim
shortDescription: Crystal Magnum admitted that her 2006 allegation that three Duke lacrosse players raped her was false.
